snippet.title: Florensia - Scavenger of the Past | Trailer [HD] | Music by Mardelas
snippet.description:
Coming 2017
Play now http://bit.ly/2vpBAoY
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/384030/Florensia/

News 
Website: https://florensia-online.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FlorensiaOnline/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Florensia

Once there was a dark wizard who was feared everywhere. He was the descendant of an ancient clan that did not want to bow before the laws of Florensia. It is said that he entered a pact with a demon to gain forbidden black magic and become invincible. This story was often told around bonfires, in the belief that it was only an old folk tale. But now proof has reached us that there is more truth behind it than we Florensians ever dared to imagine…

He has returned – and his deadly army is on its way to destroy Florensia and its inhabitants once and for all. Who will dare to stand against such pure evil?

Face the challenge and discover…

…a mysterious new map! 
…completely new gear! 
…powerful new weapons for every character class! 
…dangerous mobs! 
…a fearsome boss!

© 2017 – GAMESinFLAMES, AHA Entertainment

Music by Mardelas
https://www.facebook.com/mardelas.official/
